paragraphs.content: To the chief Musician on Neginoth, A Psalm or Song of Asaph.
paragraphs.contentHtml: To the chief Musician on Neginoth, A Psalm or Song of Asaph.

paragraphs.content: In Judah is God known: his name is great in Israel.
paragraphs.contentHtml: In Judah is God known: his name is great in Israel.

paragraphs.content: In Salem also is his tabernacle, and his dwelling place in Zion.
paragraphs.contentHtml: In Salem also is his tabernacle, and his dwelling place in Zion.

paragraphs.content: There brake he the arrows of the bow, the shield, and the sword, and the battle. Selah.
paragraphs.contentHtml: There brake he the arrows of the bow, the shield, and the sword, and the battle. Selah.

paragraphs.content: Thou art more glorious and excellent than the mountains of prey.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Thou art more glorious and excellent than the mountains of prey.

paragraphs.content: The stouthearted are spoiled, they have slept their sleep: and none of the men of might have found their hands.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The stouthearted are spoiled, they have slept their sleep: and none of the men of might have found their hands.

paragraphs.content: At thy rebuke, O God of Jacob, both the chariot and horse are cast into a dead sleep.
paragraphs.contentHtml: At thy rebuke, O God of Jacob, both the chariot and horse are cast into a dead sleep.

paragraphs.content: Thou, even thou, art to be feared: and who may stand in thy sight when once thou art angry?
paragraphs.contentHtml: Thou, even thou, art to be feared: and who may stand in thy sight when once thou art angry?

paragraphs.content: Thou didst cause judgment to be heard from heaven; the earth feared, and was still,
paragraphs.contentHtml: Thou didst cause judgment to be heard from heaven; the earth feared, and was still,

paragraphs.content: When God arose to judgment, to save all the meek of the earth. Selah.
paragraphs.contentHtml: When God arose to judgment, to save all the meek of the earth. Selah.

paragraphs.content: Surely the wrath of man shall praise thee: the remainder of wrath shalt thou restrain.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Surely the wrath of man shall praise thee: the remainder of wrath shalt thou restrain.

paragraphs.content: Vow, and pay unto the LORD your God: let all that be round about him bring presents unto him that ought to be feared.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Vow, and pay unto the Lord your God: let all that be round about him bring presents unto him that ought to be feared.

paragraphs.content: He shall cut off the spirit of princes: he is terrible to the kings of the earth.
paragraphs.contentHtml: He shall cut off the spirit of princes: he is terrible to the kings of the earth.
